message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get the rest. What do you say?
Let's split it 60/40, Alice. That seems fair to me, considering the money will lose value with each round.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it 60/40 this time. Remember, the money is losing value faster for you than it is for me.  It's in your best interest to accept.
